text:
**Clonezilla** is a Debian / Ubuntu based live CD containing Clonezilla, a partition and disk cloning software similar to Norton Ghost. It saves and restores only used blocks in hard drive. With Clonezilla, one can clone a 5 GB system to 40 clients in about 10 minutes.
**Notable features**
- Quickly and easily backup and restore from more than 5 sources in CLI.
- Nearly all file systems are supported.
- Bootloaders, including grub and syslinux, can be reinstalled.
- Both architectures available, and bases to accommodate different hardware.
- Guiding instructions advising on sources chosen, writing to disk, size mismatches etc.
**Available DEs**
- N/A
**More info**
http://clonezilla.org/
